divs: sighting detailsi heard this but i want mr carrion to know cuz i'm a believer in chris bledsoe from 'the fayettville incidnet' on the cape fear river a yr or so ago. i watched it on tv just 6 nights ago on the 18th...strange too cuz it aired around the same day of the new supposed sighting. it was seen by several people & reported to the police. i had heard it from a woman at pat's tires who knew someone who watched it. because of the fayetville incident i think it should be looked into to vindicate mr bledsoe's claim as to the red\orange ball he & his fishing buddies observed. if it was any shape but a red\orange ball or anywhere except the cape fear region, i would not report this incident kindest regards *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
Summary: RED/ORANGE BALL IN THE SKY ON CAPE FEAR RIVER
trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There were no other sightings in Wilmington on or around March 19th 2011
